message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.COM. 

The paper deals with the design of a full-duplex (FD) and amplify-and-forward (AF) relay with multiple antennas, taking into account hardware impairments. This involves analyzing the relay function and formulating an optimization problem to maximize the signal to distortion-plus-noise ratio under relay and source transmit power constraints. The problem complexity is addressed by proposing a gradient-projection-based (GP) algorithm and a non-alternating sub-optimal solution. The paper also discusses the impact of hardware impairments on system performance. Based on these factors, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are cs.IT (Information Theory), cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture), cs.SY (Systems and Control), cs.MM (Multimedia), and cs.COM (Computers and Society).
